nodes.text: CZ-5X Eradicator Droid was a battle droid manufactured by the Czerka Corporation. During the Seizure of CZ-198 in 3638 BBY the droid was used to opposed the forces trying to establish control over CZ-198, but was destroyed.
CZ-5X Eradicator Droid appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel as a hostile NPC on CZ-198.
